React Native Lab 1: Building a Profile Card App

This project is a Profile Card Application built using React Native with Expo.
The app demonstrates fundamental React Native concepts such as:

Creating reusable components

Styling using StyleSheet

Layout with Flexbox

Scrollable content using ScrollView

Handling user interaction with TouchableOpacity and Alert

Each profile card displays a userâ€™s photo, name, and role, and shows an alert when tapped.
